description:
The suitcase is already full? No room even for a dictionary? And abroad, no Internet connection is available?

No problem! Fortunately, there is OfflineDict! A dictionary that - as the name implies - does not require an internet connection, because the dictionaries are maintained on the device. Especially abroad, where so often help in translating is needed, this is very important!

Offline Dict delivers with no dictionaries. But that is no problem, & is definitely intended! The user can determine by himself, which dictionaries are downloaded from the Internet

This are the features of OfflineDict:
- Up to 10 different dictionaries can be installed (full version)
- No Internet connection needed to operate
- Support for foreign character sets (eg, Chinese) in the display
- Dictionaries can easily be downloaded from the Internet
- Dictionaries import as a file is also possible
- Intelligent search function, that finds parts of words
- WebOS size limits can by bypassed automatically by sequential files


NEW:
1.0.3
- Adapted for the Pre3
